column5: 22 miles from NRG Stadium! Minutes away from Houston attractions. Very spacious beautiful 5 bedroom home with lots of natural light! Huge backyard with basketball court and cozy patio furniture. Two story home, downstairs = master bedroom with full bath, living room, kitchen, dining room, parlor, and full bath. Upstairs = game room, home theater, library, 4 large bedrooms, and full bath with double sinks. Tons of space!
